page.title: 07CARAVAN PARK LOSSIEMOUTH.
page.content: On the western fringes of Lossiemouth is the excellent holiday caravan park of Silver Sands.It boasts of many facilities,including holiday homes of a very high standard and also a site for pitching tents and siting caravans.Swings and slides are provided for children.There is a club-room where Discos and indoor games can be played. Other facilities include a shower room,toilets,a launderette,a mini-market,an amusement arcade and a cocktail bar. Overlooking the park,like a sentinel, stands Covesea Lighthouse,now unmanned,but the original lamp and mechanism can be seen at the local Fishing Museum.There are caves in the cliffs on which the lighthouse stands, said to have been used by smugglers in days gone by.
